author: news@courierpublicationsllc.com (Staff)
title: Everyman holds open auditions
text:
Everyman holds open auditions Oct 16, 2015 
Rockland — Everyman Repertory Theatre will hold open auditions for its 2016 season Tuesday evening, Oct. 27, at Lincoln Street Center, 24 Lincoln St. The auditions will run between 6 and 9 p.m. in Room 102. 
Auditioners need not bring an audition monologue, although if they have something prepared, Everyman would be happy to hear it. There will be sides from a selection of the shows being producing in the upcoming season to read from; time will be allowed to read them and prepare before being asked to perform. 
Courier Publications’ A&E Editor Dagney C. Ernest can be reached at (207) 594-4401, ext. 115; or dernest@courierpublicationsllc.com.
